caption.p: Measurement of cytokines and chemokines. Pancreas, spleen, ovary, uterus, blood, and peritoneal cavity fluids were collected from BALB/c mice 24 h or 4 days after intraperitoneal infection with influenza A/WSN/1933 virus. Cytokines (A) and chemokines (B) in organ lysates, sera, and peritoneal fluids were quantified using a CBA mouse Th1/Th2/Th17 cytokine kit (BD Biosciences) and a LEGENDplex TM Mouse Proinflammatory Chemokine Panel (BioLegend). * p < 0.05, ** P < 0.005, and *** P < 0.0005 indicate statistical significance compared with PBS injection.
